SettingsConfig.ELAPerformanceDescription: Note about ELA Performance Task Items: The item you selected is part of a Performance Task, which consists of multiple items of different types (for example, Multiple Choice, Short Answer, Extended Response, etc.). The item you selected is listed first, and the other items from the Performance Task are below it. The “About this Item” link will tell you more about the item you selected. Please note that during the actual assessment, the Dictionary and Thesaurus are only available for Writing Extended Response item types.
